de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.featureExtraction
Class FeatureMatchChecker

java.lang.Object
  de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.featureExtraction.FeatureMatchChecker

public class FeatureMatchChecker
extends java.lang.Object

This class checks whether a coreference pair matches the required features specified by user configuration. As only certain features should be reflected by the evaluation process, this filtering is used to sort out the feature values which are not of interest.

Constructor Summary
FeatureMatchChecker()
          Initializes the FeatureMatchChecker by setting the correct Configuration and Logging options.
 
Method Summary
 boolean doesMatch(Feature<?> fe)
          Reads the filter value for the current feature from property file and compares, whether the value featureValue matches the required value.
 boolean doesMatchRequiredFeatures(CoreferencePair crp)
          Checks whether the current coreference pair shows feature values which have been specified by the user.
 java.util.List<CoreferencePair> filterNonMatchingFeatures(java.util.List<CoreferencePair> corefPairs)
          Filters out coreference pairs which don't match the required features and therefore shouldn't be evaluated.

Method Detail

filterNonMatchingFeatures

public java.util.List<CoreferencePair> filterNonMatchingFeatures(java.util.List<CoreferencePair> corefPairs)
Filters out coreference pairs which don't match the required features and therefore shouldn't be evaluated.

Parameters:
corefPairs - The coref pairs which will be filtered
Returns:
List of CoreferencePair which should be evaluated.

doesMatchRequiredFeatures

public boolean doesMatchRequiredFeatures(CoreferencePair crp)
Checks whether the current coreference pair shows feature values which have been specified by the user.

Parameters:
crp - The coreference pair which is checked.
Returns:
true if the current pair should be used for testing, false otherwise.

doesMatch

public boolean doesMatch(Feature<?> fe)
Reads the filter value for the current feature from property file and compares, whether the value featureValue matches the required value.

Parameters:
fe - The feature currently being examined.
Returns:
true if the features match, false otherwise.
